summary: Adds three redguard followers to skyrim with an optional Ahtar replacer.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#6d9eeb][font=Times New Roman][size=5][u]REQUIREMENTS[/u][/size][/font]
[/color]
Dawnguard


[font=Times New Roman][color=#6d9eeb][size=5][u]RECOMMENDED[/u][/size][/color][/font]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]Face Light[/url] if you want to see their face more clearly
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12933/?]Extensible Follower Framework[/url] for more follower functionality
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52019/?]Follower Commentary Overhaul[/url] for more follower commentary
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24909/?]Book of Silence[/url] by CaBaL120
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69784/?]Rustic Clothes[/url] by Gamwich
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76744/?]OSA | Skyrim Ascendancy Engine[/url] by CE0
[url=http://www.loverslab.com/files/file/3086-poser-module-for-osa-skyrim-ascendancy-engine/]Poser Module[/url] by Morra
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25259/?]Remodeled armors[/url] By CT77

[font=Times New Roman][color=#6d9eeb][size=5][u]INSTALLATION[/u][/size][/color][/font]

 Nexus Mod Manager or Mod Organizer for easy installation
For manual (NOT RECOMMENDED):
Simply extract the files to the main Skyrim directory
ALWAYS MAKE A BACKUP OF WHAT YOU'RE OVERWRITING!

[font=Times New Roman][color=#6d9eeb][size=5][u]UN-INSTALLATION[/u][/size][/color][/font]

 NMM and MO un-installation is easy.
For manual: 
Use your backup to overwrite what was changed or delete the Durion, Raziel, and Rienna folders.


[u][font=Times New Roman][color=#6d9eeb][size=5]DESCRIPTION[/size][/color][/font][/u]

Durion, Rienna and Raziel are siblings that were separated as children in a bandit raid. 
 
[img]https://68.media.tumblr.com/b1d0067dea0863acc9cfb38204d16eda/tumblr_omvd9i1UOq1w6d9cko3_1280.png[/img]

Durion

Durion was found and rescued by some mercs and was raised by them. The mercs instilled a love of freedom and raised him to be a potent fighter. He loves to drink while he's not fighting.

Voice: MaleDrunk
Lvl 6 - Max Lvl
Protected
Marriage: Yes
Proficiencies: Heavy Armor, 2-handed, Block


[img]https://68.media.tumblr.com/a2aa2e54ba045bbdc4c6b618f457bc0f/tumblr_omvd9i1UOq1w6d9cko2_1280.png[/img]

Raziel

  Raziel, oddly enough, was rescued by a band of Orcs who raised him. His talent for fighting stood out among the Orcs and he was welcomed as a part of the family.

Voice: Orc
Lvl 6 - Max Lvl
Protected
Marriage: Yes
Proficiencies: Heavy Armor, 2-handed, Block

[img]https://68.media.tumblr.com/e8164e4c782a3c74284cf8eb81d1d321/tumblr_omvd9i1UOq1w6d9cko1_1280.png[/img]

Rienna

The Dark Brotherhood somehow found their hands on Rienna as a child. They decided to raise her as a part of the family. Why you may ask? Some say Astrid wanted a blank slate, someone who wasn't bound by the old tenants of the Brotherhood. Other say, the Brotherhood saw her talent as an assassin from a young age.

Voice: Eventoned
Lvl 10 - Max Lvl
Protected
Marriage: Yes
Proficiencies: Light Armor, 1-handed (Dual Wield), Sneak[/center]

[u][size=5][center][font=Times New Roman][color=#6d9eeb]Optional[/color][/font][/center][/size][/u][center]
There's an optional replacer for Ahtar. the solitude executioner. Ahtar can also become your follower after a certain quest (He could be your follower in the vanilla game as well.) There's also a 4k version of Rienna available for download.


[img]https://68.media.tumblr.com/381667c7ae1a72aaaac4ff42404e388f/tumblr_omvkz6npyW1w6d9cko1_1280.png[/img]

[img]https://68.media.tumblr.com/d409cb5ba5a208fdf3b462a0f5edfba7/tumblr_omvkz6npyW1w6d9cko3_1280.png[/img]

[font=Times New Roman][size=5][u][color=#6d9eeb]Q & A[/color][/u]
[/size][/font]
Q: Where are they located?
A: Durian is at the Drunken Huntsman. Raziel is at the Sleeping Giant Inn. (Wanted to put him at an Orc stronghold but some issues arrived) Rienna is a the Windpeak Inn.

Q: What body are they using?
A: Rienna - CBBE (More specifically using a bodyslide I made)
Raziel and Durion: Better males

Q: Any other body types than CBBE?
A: At this time, no. I primarily use the CBBE as there are more mods for it. If enough demand for it, I may consider it.
[b]
[/b]Q: Is there an SoS patch for Durion and Raziel?
A: [url=http://www.loverslab.com/files/file/3875-durion-rienna-raziel-drr-followers/]Why yes. Yes there is.[/url]

[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35474/?]Ningheim Race[/url] by Seren4XX

[/url][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30411/]Brows[/url] by Hvergelmir
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/114172]Chris57[/url] and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1106672]FavoredSoul[/url] - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488]Better males[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22701/?]Seductive Lips HD[/url][b] [/b]by EcthelionOtW
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73512/?]Leyenda Skin[/url] by HeroedeLeyenda
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos - Renewal[/url] by Kalilies
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27815/?]Fine Face Textures[/url] by Urshi

fadingsignal for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58443/?]Skysight Skins[/url]

[u][size=3]Please let me know if there is any lack of mentioning in credits.[/size]
[size=3]Thank you very much, great modders!![/size]
[/u]

[u][font=Times New Roman][color=#6d9eeb][size=5]Known Bugs[/size][/color][/font][/u]

Durion's and Raziel's right eye is a little weird. It's kinda like they're blind in that eye and if the sun it's it just right, it has a strong shine to it. I'm not sure how to fix this but it's not that noticable.

For some reason, using the Durion/Ahtar replacer causes him to walk from the palace to the execution block causing a long delay for that scene. Also he may not kill Roggvir. I recommend either using the console to kill Roggvir once Durion is on the stage or using the replacer after the scene is done. Raziel does NOT have the same bug! (Or at least he shouldn't...)

Durion and Raziel also has a neck seam with the Better males version. That's just how the textures are. I recommend using the SoS patch as there is less of a seam with that or using a different texture all together. I also recommend [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81004/?]The Veteran Skin[/url] by ZwabberdieBo for Raziel to give him a more mature, veteran look. Look in the downloads for this version!



[img]https://68.media.tumblr.com/a2f5aa28b9c76fef907974bcdf570b87/tumblr_omvnni9yrV1w6d9cko1_1280.png[/img][/center]
author: Killagamevii
